label: A5B2_cI336_230_g2h_h-001
title: Zr$_{6}$Cl$_{15}$ (Zr$_{2}$Cl$_{5}$) Structure
comments:
This is a body-centered cubic ordering of Zr$_{6}$Cl$_{15}$ molecules. 
 This structure was first determined by (Corbett, 1978) and reprinted in (Corbett, 1982). The ICSD entry lists the earlier paper as the reference. 
 The ICSD using Ta$_{6}$Cl$_{15}$ as the prototype.
